name: Manual Pressure Testing Unit
description:
for the pressure test of 12- and 50-kg-cylinders
consisting of:
- 1 steel frame for two cylinders and for the fixing of the instruments
- 4 high pressure hose DN 10 / PN 100, length 2 m
- 1 pressure test head for 12-kg-cylinders
- 1 pressure test head for 50-kg-cylinders
- 1 pneum. presssure test pump
for test pressure 0 - 60 bar
- 1 control pannel complete with
2 pcs. 3-way valves,
2 pcs. ball valves and pressure gauge 0 - 100 bar
Galvanized
